concept.title: Image Tasks
concept.shortdesc: An image is the basis for instances that you spin up for your computing needs. This section explains how to create or acquire an image and then add it to your Eucalyptus cloud.

conbody.p: There are a few ways you can create or acquire an image for use in a Eucalyptus cloud:

ul.li: Add an image based on an existing image. Eucalyptus has stock images available to help you get started right away. You can find links to these images in EuStore, or you can use the EuStore command line tools. For more information, see Browse and Install Images from EuStore.
Add an image that you create. For more information, see the Create a New Image section.
Migrate an image from another cloud, such as Amazon Web Services (AWS). For more information, see the Migrate an Image section.
